hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:the Prophet (ﷺ) said, "He who slaps his cheeks, tears his clothes and follows the ways and traditions of the Days of Ignorance is not one of us

chapter.ara-name: باب لَيْسَ مِنَّا مَنْ شَقَّ الْجُيُوبَ
chapter.eng-name: He who tears off his clothes (when afflicted with a calamity) is not from us
